common.description: FloorpはFirefoxをベースに日本で作られた、プライバシーと柔軟性に優れた新しいブラウザです。

downloadPage.downloadAlert: Floorpをダウンロードすると、<1>プライバシーポリシー</1>に同意したものとみなされます。
downloadPage.downloadHashes: ハッシュをダウンロード

daylight.label: Floorp Daylightをダウンロード
daylight.description: Floorp DaylightはFloorpのベータ版です。正常に動作しないかもしれません。
daylight.alert: 本当に、Floorp Daylightをダウンロードしますか？正常に動作しないかもしれません。

downloadPage.noReleaseFound: リリースが見つかりませんでした。

landingPage.hero:
<1>Floorpによる</1>
無制限の
カスタマイズ性

heroCard.title: Floorp ブラウザ
heroCard.description: Floorpは日本で作られたFirefoxをベースにした新しいブラウザです。プライバシーと柔軟性に焦点を当てたブラウザです。

privacy.title: Strong Tracking Protection
privacy.description: By default, Floorp includes a robust tracking blocker, protecting users from a variety of malicious trackers lurking on the web. Additionally, it provides fingerprinting protection.

flexible.title: Flexible Layout
flexible.description: Floorp's layout customization is unlimited. Move the tab bar to the bottom of the window, hide the title bar, and more. Create your own Floorp.

switchable.title: Switchable Design
switchable.description: In addition to the usual Firefox theme customization, Floorp allows you to switch between five different interface designs, including OS-specific themes.

sidebar.title: Regular Updates
sidebar.description: Floorp is based on Firefox ESR. Floorp will be updated every 4 weeks, with security updates provided before each Firefox release.

noTracking.title: No User Tracking
noTracking.description: We don't collect personal information from users. We don't track users. We don't sell user data. We have no affiliation with any advertising companies.

openSource.title: Powered by Open Source
openSource.description: The source code for Floorp is mostly public, allowing anyone to view it and contribute to Floorp. Not only is the browser itself open to the public, but the build environment is also open source.

dualSidebar.title: Dual Sidebar
dualSidebar.description:
Are you satisfied with just one sidebar? Want to open your website in the sidebar? Floorp features a built-in sidebar that can display a web panel and browser management tools for a comfortable browsing experience.
A sidebar for busy people! Check everything from bookmarks and history to websites!

flexibleToolbar.title: Flexible Toolbar & Tab Bar
flexibleToolbar.description:
Tree Style Tabs and use it as vertical tabs or in combination. Customize your bookmarks bar and more. It is such a browser that you can reach the itch.
We deliver the best customization for everyone from customization beginners to experts, such as custom CSS for those who want to be particular and basic themes!

privacyProtection.title: Think about the USER and the WEB
privacyProtection.description:
Floorp does not track users and only blocks malicious tracking on websites. With Floorp you can build an internet that benefits both websites and users.
Blocking only harmful trackers by listening to the opinions of both website owners who make a living from advertising and users who want to protect their privacy, why not use Floorp in finding a better internet?

landingPage.downloadFloorp: Floorpブラウザの最新バージョンを入手
